in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.service

Interface AccessService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessServiceImpl

    public interface AccessService

    Service class to perform below user services :

    • Verify User
    • Verify PasswordResetAuthenticationToken
    • Send PasswordResetMail
    • Update Password
    Author:
    bismoy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Boolean sendPasswordResetMail(java.lang.String emailAddress)
      Sending password reset mail
      java.lang.Boolean updateUserPassword(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String newPassword)
      Update user's password
      java.lang.Boolean verifyPasswordResetAuthenticationToken(java.lang.String emailAddress, java.lang.String passwordResetAuthenticationToken)
      PasswordResetAuthenticationToken Verification
      java.lang.Boolean verifyUser(java.lang.String emailAddress)
      User Verification

    • Method Detail

      • verifyUser

        java.lang.Boolean verifyUser(java.lang.String emailAddress)

        User Verification

        Verifies if user is valid by calling verifyUser method from AccessServiceImpl class

        Parameters:
        emailAddress - email id of user used as username

      • verifyPasswordResetAuthenticationToken

        java.lang.Boolean verifyPasswordResetAuthenticationToken(java.lang.String emailAddress,
                                                       java.lang.String passwordResetAuthenticationToken)

        PasswordResetAuthenticationToken Verification

        Verifies if password authentication token got generated by calling authenticateToken method from authenticationService class

        Parameters:
        emailAddress - email id of user used as username
        passwordResetAuthenticationToken - Authentication token generated while reseting password

      • sendPasswordResetMail

        java.lang.Boolean sendPasswordResetMail(java.lang.String emailAddress)

        Sending password reset mail

        Sends password reset mail by calling sendPasswordResetMail method from defaultMailService class

        Parameters:
        emailAddress - email id of user used as username

      • updateUserPassword

        java.lang.Boolean updateUserPassword(java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String newPassword)

        Update user's password

        Updates new password by calling save method from userDAO class

        Parameters:
        username - email id of user used as username
        newPassword - New password of the user
